DOC.brief_summary: In order to manage of type 2 diabetic patients with irregular lifestyle, developement of an appropriate questionnaire to evaluate a regularity of lifestyle is necessary.
DOC.brief_title: Developement of Questionnaire to Evaluate a Regularity of Lifestyle in Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: We have a plan to perform the seven day's records and the questionnaires which is necessary to type 2 diabetic patients for the initial step. Next, we will revise a questionnaire with professional advices for several times. Finally we will test a reliability with a final version as form of multisite based study and will confirm a questionnaire for a regularity of lifestyle in type 2 diabetes.
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patients Type 1 diabetic patients, gestational DM patients
